title: Phase 2: Issue types
description:
## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Add `Type` field to Issue model (string)
- [ ] Define types in config.json: feature, bug, chore
- [ ] Default type: feature
- [ ] Add `--type` flag to `work create` and `work edit`
- [ ] Add `--type` filter to `work list`
- [ ] Display type in `work show` and `work list` output
- [ ] Validate type against config on create/edit
- [ ] Tests for type CRUD, filtering, validation

## Context
Part of: Issue tracker personas & workflows
Depends on: Phase 1
